detail_desc: Trainers in mesh with a lightly padded edge and tongue. Jersey linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Short, gathered top in crinkled jersey with a small V-shaped opening at the front and a halter neck that ties at the back. Lined.
Short coat in soft pile with narrow notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front and side pockets. Lined.
Trousers in a patterned viscose weave with an elasticated waist, side pockets and wide, slightly shorter legs.
Plastic water bottle with a screw top and practical wrist strap that also holds the top in place. Capacity 550 ml.
Long satin coat with narrow notch lapels and a loose yoke at the back. Side pockets, a detachable tie belt at the waist and high slits in the sides. Unlined.
V-neck jumpsuit in a patterned crêpe weave with narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a cut-out section and ties at the back. Elasticated seam at the waist, pleats at the front and side pockets.

Lightly padded baseball jacket in nylon with appliqués, a small, ribbed stand-up collar and press-studs down the front. Welt front pockets, an inner pocket with a hook and loop fastening, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Short dress in an airy weave with long raglan sleeves and a decorative drawstring and opening at the top. Elasticated seam at the waist and flounces at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Adjustable on-ear headphones with ears at the top with glittery sections. Designed to fit mobile phones with a 3.5 mm socket. Length of wire approx. 120 cm.
Ankle-length, pull-on trousers in soft twill with elastication at the back of the waist. Loose fit with a fake fly, side pockets, a fake back pocket and tapered legs.
Short, fitted shorts in soft imitation leather with a concealed zip in one side. Lined in a cotton blend.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton jersey with a collar, button placket and slits in the sides.
Short, straight-cut dungaree dress in stretch twill with a chest pocket, adjustable, printed grosgrain straps with metal fasteners, and buttons at the sides. Unlined.

Rain trousers in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with closed seams and adjustable elastic braces with plastic fasteners. Press-studs at the sides, elastication at the back of the waist and hems, a reinforced elastic strap under the feet and reflective details. Unlined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Jumpsuit in soft pile with a hood and a zip down the front with a star-shaped tab. Embroidered appliqués and a reversible sequin motif on the front, appliqués with pompoms down the sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.

Fully lined sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back and moulded, padded cups that lift and shape while providing good support. Elasticated hem and a fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes. Medium support.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.
Fitted V-neck dress in stretch cotton jersey with short sleeves, a gathered seam at one side and an asymmetric hem.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neck, motif on the front and straight-cut hem.
Straight-style jumper in a soft knit containing some wool and some alpaca wool. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fully lined bikini top with hole-patterned, underwired, moulded, padded cups that lift and shape, and ties at the back of the neck.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif and a ribbed trim around the neckline.

prod_name: S. Skinny HW Ankle Star Consc
detail_desc: 5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with an extra-high waist, zip fly and button, and super-skinny legs.

Fancy dress all-in-one suit in soft pile with a zip down the front and hood with sewn-on ears and appliqués. Narrow ribbing at the cuffs and hems, and a detachable tail with a hook and loop fastening.

Calf-length coat in a recycled Italian wool blend with notch lapels and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Diagonal side pockets, an inner pocket and a high-cut single back vent. Lining in twill made from recycled polyester.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, waffle-knit cotton with a zip-up chest pocket in contrasting colour woven fabric. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless, fitted top in ribbed jersey made from a viscose blend with a shaped neckline front and back.
Caps with an adjustable plastic fastener at the back. One cap in cotton jersey and the other in twill made from a cotton and viscose blend.
Running tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband with a concealed drawstring, a zipped key pocket at the back and a zip at the hems. Reflective details.

Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric. High waist with elastication at the back and a sewn-in tie belt at the front, pleats at the top, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs with creases.
Patterned swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Hat in a soft, rib-knit wool blend.
Socks in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend. Short, elasticated shaft with a crocheted frill trim at the top.
Gloves in a soft, fine knit. Fleece lining.
Short top in a soft rib knit with narrow shoulder straps.
Jumper in a fine knit containing some wool with appliqués. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Long jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Top in soft cotton jersey with short puff sleeves.
Chinos in a cotton weave with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets, welt back pockets and tapered legs.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft cotton jersey with a decorative lace trim around the neckline and armholes, and press-studs at the crotch.

Sports top in fast-drying mesh with dropped shoulders and long sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs. Gathers at the sides for best fit over the tummy, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
Sleeveless dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with elastication at the top and narrow shoulder straps with a decorative bow. Gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt.
Dress in sweatshirt fabric with a zip at the top, lined hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Oversized top in cotton sweatshirt fabric with a cut-out section on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a narrow decorative trim at the top. Mid waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Hoodie in patterned sweatshirt fabric with an appliqué at the top. Jersey-lined, drawstring hood, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Lace, front-fastening push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that split and cross at the back.
Pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with a press-stud on one shoulder and ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and button and slim legs. Made using Lycra® Lastingfit technology to retain the shape of the jeans for a consistent fit.
Fitted top in soft, patterned jersey with short, flounced sleeves.
Hairband with a knot detail at the front and covered elastic at the back.
Top in cotton sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Knee-length skirt in airy, pleated chiffon. Regular waist with covered elastication. Lined.

Cargo trousers in stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Side pockets, flap leg pockets with a hook and loop fastening and fake back pockets. Tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees and ribbed hems.
Sleeveless dresses in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Straw hat with a narrow band decorated with small pompoms. Width of brim 3.5 cm.
Lightweight trainers in imitation leather with a padded mesh edge, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.

Baby Exclusive. All-in-one suit in soft, fine-knit merino wool with a round neckline and long raglan sleeves. Buttons on one shoulder, at the crotch and down the legs, and roll edges around the neckline, cuffs and hems.
Push-up bra in lace and mesh with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Pyjamas in soft pointelle made from a viscose blend. V-neck top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a lace trim at the top. Short shorts with an elasticated waist and lace-trimmed hems.

Dungarees in stretch, flexible denim for maximum comfort. Classic fit with press-studs at the sides, adjustable straps with metal fasteners and straight legs. Chest pocket, front and back pockets and an additional pocket on one leg. The cotton content of the dungarees is partly recycled.
Calf-length skirt in a viscose weave with a high waist, pleats at the front for added width and a concealed zip in one side. Unlined.
Fine-knit, V-neck jumper with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Waterproof hi-tops in mesh and imitation leather with a padded edge and tongue. Hook and loop tab at the top, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Short, A-line skirt with buttons down the front.
Short, wide necklace in mesh containing metal wires. Adjustable length, 30-37 cm.
Playsuit in a viscose weave with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, elasticated seam at the waist, diagonal side pockets and short legs.
Long-sleeved nightshirt in a soft cotton weave with buttons down the front, a chest pocket and a rounded hem.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a grandad collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Contrasting colour on the inside of the collar and cuffs.
5-pocket trousers in stretch cotton twill with a regular waist and slim legs.
Fitted top in stretch jersey with a round neck and long sleeves.
Jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, a chest pocket and welt front pockets with a flap. Buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.
5-pocket shorts in soft, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), a zip fly and button and raw-edge, frayed hems.
Short shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back in ventilating mesh and a wide elasticated hem. Light support.
Shirt in airy cotton with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Jersey sports top in a stretch cotton blend with taped details. Lined drawstring hood with a wrapover front, long raglan sleeves with ribbed cuffs, a rounded hem and reflective details. Zipped pocket on one side and a high zip on the other. Slightly longer at the back.

Chinos in stretch cotton twill with a zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets, a coin pocket and welt back pockets with a button. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the thighs and knees to create a comfortable, straight silhouette.
5-pocket, high-waisted trousers in washed stretch twill with a zip fly and button, and slim legs.
